channel.title: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?
channel.description:
hi, everytime i run my server, i get this message
Now starting Drowning508... Please wait...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: palidino76.rs2.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: palidino76/rs2/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . i know i have to change the directory, but i did! i tried like 10 other things! here is my run info:
@echo off title Starting... echo. echo Now starting Drowning508... Please wait... echo. cd ../bin title Drowning508 - ONLINE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

item.title: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

so should it be server.class i should write, or just server?, and i dont see how it cant find it, its right there in palidino76…

Read full topic
item.source: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?

item.title: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

  1. Make sure it’s pointing to the .class file not the .java. (Usually in a whole different server folder)

  2. This means it can’t fine the Server.class in palidino76/rs2/

Read full topic
item.source: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?

item.title: Run server problem? HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

hi, everytime i run my server, i get this message

Now starting Drowning508… Please wait…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: palidino76/rs2/Server

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: palidino76.rs2.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: palidino76/rs2/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
i know i have to change the directory, but i did! i tried like 10 other things! here is my run info:

@echo off
title Starting…
echo.
echo Now starting Drowning508… Please wait…
echo.
cd …/bin
title Drowning508 - ONLINE
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause
